Just about everybody who performs a monologue ended up cracking a joke about Christina Aguilera , including David Letterman ( who noted ''I know all about public humiliation'') and Jay Leno ( who said Secretary of Homeland Security Janet Napolitano told everybody if you see something at the Super Bowl that isn't right, tell somebody- and immediately 50 million people called after Christina Aguilera did the national anthem). so, but it turns out a State Department cable exists in which Saddam Hussein thanked Donald Rumsfeld for the message. The letter must have come from the State Department itself, Donald Rumsfeld says. How could anyone believe that you couldn't remember if you delivered a letter from Ronald Reagan to Saddam Hussein ? he says. ''That's the kind of thing that persuaded me to take my time and look at the documents, since I had so many of them.''

, a game in which the Eagles trailed by 21 points in the fourth quarter. '' Michael Vick has great instincts. Michael Vick 's got it all at this point,'' Eagles offensive co-ordinator Marty Mornhinweg said. Really, the most important quality, in my opinion, for a quarterback to have is gut instincts, then comes the decision-making and the timing and accuracy. Then comes the big arm and athleticism and those types of things. The gut instincts are critical for a quarterback, and you can see that. Not only did Michael Vick make a remarkable turnaround on the field, but his image is improving away from the game.
